plot: A thriller that takes it's premise from the real life incident of a woman who hit a man, then drove home, and parked the car in the garage with the man wedged halfway through her wind shield. what happens next makes the rest of the thrilling story.   Written by  Magna Stardust
title: Accident on Hill Road
plot_es: A thriller that takes it's premise from the real life incident of a woman who hit a man, then drove home, and parked the car in the garage with the man wedged halfway through her wind shield. what happens next makes the rest of the thrilling story.   Written by  Magna Stardust
